author: Associated Press
title: India Halts Trains as Coronavirus Spreads Across World’s Second-Most Populous Nation
description: India's lifeblood train services are suspended with at least 80 districts with confirmed virus cases under stringent lockdown
content:
(NEW DELHI) — As India expanded its virus-containment measures and halted its lifeblood train network, the federal government warned Monday of strict legal action for those who flout the rules.
